Loading packages

```{r}
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, vegan, iNEXT, nlme, readxl)
```

Loading Data
```{r}
df <- readxl::read_excel("uniao.xlsx")
```


Getting only the necessary variables

```{r}
df <- df[, c("Kingdom", "Phylum", "Diabasadden", "Longyearbyen")]
```
